mapper.select: select lesson_id no, titl title, sdt startDate, edt endDate, tot_hr totalHours from lms_lesson order by sdt desc
select lesson_id no, titl title, conts contents, sdt startDate, edt endDate, tot_hr totalHours, day_hr dayHours from lms_lesson where lesson_id=#{value}
mapper.update: update lms_lesson set titl=#{title}, conts=#{contents}, sdt=#{startDate}, edt=#{endDate}, tot_hr=#{totalHours}, day_hr=#{dayHours} where lesson_id=#{no}
